data.title: 'High School Musical‚Äôs Zac Efron, Corbin Bleu, and Lucas Grabeel Just Reunited
data.meta_description: See photos of ‚ÄòHigh School Musical‚Äôs Zac Efron, Corbin Bleu, and Lucas Grabeel latest reunion on Broadway.
data.text:
Zac Efron may have missed the High School Musical cast's 10-year anniversary reunion on Disney Channel earlier this year, but he made up for it in his own special way last night. Troy Bolton came out of nowhere with a selfie that included the rest of the boys from the series, Corbin Bleu and Lucas Grabeel (AKA Chad Danforth and Ryan Evans).

He captioned the post: "@mrgrabeel and I saw @corbinbleu DANCE on AIR ala Fred Astaire last night. He tapped ‚ÄúFirecracker‚Äù and lit the stage on üî• with his moves!" Zac and Lucas both supported Corbin by attending his latest Broadway appearance in the Holliday Inn musical.

Though it would have been nice to see Vanessa Hudgens and the rest of HSM crew on the 'gram, maybe they'll see him perform together another day. Now, we're just holding out for that full-on HSM reunion with all of the actors!
